author: Matt Hollidge
description: Perhaps this would more aptly be named the Alpine Cup. No matter, it's a true Summer Cup in style, well-balanced and refreshing any season of the year.
name: Swiss Cup 5
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
Top with tonic water and ginger ale
